column1: Kata Robata////The dessert was the best part. They switch out their desserts once in awhile since the pastry chef likes experimenting. I had the frozen vanilla bean + mango dessert. It came with 5-6 different things on the plate (vanilla bean ice cream
column6: frozen mango mousse rocks). Each ingredient tasted really good on its alone
column7: but when you combine all of them in one bite... MIND. BLOWING. Maybe I'm a little biased since mangoes and vanilla bean ice cream are my two favorite things ever
